channel.title: EasyID :: EasyID Documentation
channel.description: Introduction If youâ€™re ever developing an application which uses OIDC for login, it can get tiresome setting up an OIDC provider to use during development. EasyID simplifies this by mocking out a basic OP for use in development. With a little configuration, your app can request and receive access and id tokens without you needing to authenticate and consent.
